nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. Northwest wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 8am. Partly sunny. High near 81, with temperatures falling to around 77 in the afternoon. North wind 1 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and midnight, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. Northeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
